title: Treasuries Rise as 20-Year Auction Highlights Solid Demand
description: Treasuries climbed as strong demand for an auction of 20-year bonds allayed concerns about repercussions for US financial assets of President Donald Trump’s threats of Greenland-related tariffs, and advanced further after he backed down.
content: Treasuries climbed as strong demand for an auction of 20-year bonds allayed concerns about repercussions for US financial assets of President Donald Trump’s threats of Greenland-related tariffs, and advanced further after he backed down.
